0:
- name: TZ
  value: "${TIMEZONE}"
- name: JAVA_OPTS_APPEND
  value: "-Djgroups.dns.query=keycloak-headless"
- name: KC_PROXY
  value: edge
- name: KC_HTTP_ENABLED
  value: "true"
- name: KC_HOSTNAME
  value: localhost:30443
- name: KC_HOSTNAME_STRICT
  value: "false"
- name: KC_HOSTNAME_STRICT_HTTPS
  value: "false"
- name: KC_HTTPS_PORT
  value: "30443"
- name: KC_LOG_LEVEL
  value: "org.keycloak.events:DEBUG,org.infinispan:INFO,org.jgroups:INFO"
- name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN
  value: "${KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_USER}"
- name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD
  value: "${KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASS}"

# - name: QUARKUS_TRANSACTION_MANAGER_ENABLE_RECOVERY
#   value: "true"
# - name: KC_CACHE_STACK
#   value: kubernetes
# - name: KC_DB_USERNAME
#   value: "${POSTGRES_SSO_USERNAME}"
# - name: KC_DB_PASSWORD
#   value: "${POSTGRES_SSO_PASSWORD}"
# - name: KC_DB
#   value: postgres
# - name: KC_DB_URL_HOST
#   value: "postgresql.sso.svc.cluster.local"
# - name: KC_DB_URL_PORT
#   value: "5432"
# - name: KC_DB_URL_DATABASE
#   value: sso
# - name: KC_CACHE
#   value: ispn
# - name: KC_HTTP_RELATIVE_PATH
#   value: /auth
# - name: KC_HTTPS_CERTIFICATE_FILE
#   value: /opt/keycloak/conf/tls.crt
# - name: KC_HTTPS_CERTIFICATE_KEY_FILE
#   value: /opt/keycloak/conf/tls.key
# - name: KC_HTTPS_TRUST_STORE_FILE
#   value: /opt/keycloak/conf/truststore.jks
# - name: KC_HTTPS_TRUST_STORE_PASSWORD
#   value: password
# - name: KC_HTTPS_CLIENT_AUTH
#   value: request

# Could use the above envar, but lets use the quarkus conf file
quarkus.transaction-manager.enable-recovery=true
# quarkus.http.non-application-root-path=/

- name: objectstore
  emptyDir:
    sizeLimit: 100Mi
- name: quarkusproperties
  secret:
    secretName: keycloak-quarkusproperties
    defaultMode: 0777

- mountPath: /ObjectStore
  name: objectstore
- name: quarkusproperties
  mountPath: /opt/keycloak/conf/quarkus.properties
  subPath: quarkus.properties

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit

# host  database    user                  address       auth-method
#
local   all         all                                 trust
local   replication postgres                            trust
host    all         all                   localhost     md5
hostssl postgres    postgres              10.0.0.0/8    md5
hostssl postgres    replication           10.0.0.0/8    md5
hostssl replication postgres              10.0.0.0/8    md5
hostssl replication replication           10.0.0.0/8    md5
#
host    teamcity    teamcity              10.0.0.0/8    md5

mkdir -p /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg && cp /insserver.cfg /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg/insserver.cfg && cp /motd.txt /data/serverfiles/insurgency/motd.txt && chown -R 1000:1000 /data && echo "Setup complete"
